Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] Data Literacy für Studierende der Geisteswissenschaften

Messages.Author: Hamid Mostofi Darbani
Messages.Content: Dear Students   Please upload your presentation file here in ISIS Best Mostofi

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Exam session on 28 Mai - Data Literacy

Messages.Author: Hamid Mostofi Darbani
Messages.Content: Dear Students,  We have final session for data literacy on 28th May at 13:30 online. In this session students should present their assignment . The topic is application of AI for teaching and pedagogy. For this assignment , you are free to select differertnt topics of the AI application for teaching . You can present some examples how AI can be used in the classes and schools. Also you can show positive and negative aspects of AI for students. You are free toe select the details of your presentation.   Each group for presentation can be one person till maximum 3 persons.  The link of session is :   https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/62759371260?pwd=UDlXT0JXazZFOHJaTk5qbVZYS3poQT09 Meeting ID: 627 5937 1260 Passcode: 727790  See you then Warm regards Hamid Mostofi
